LCA.instruction: I would like to open an account with my son, do u have any product for kids?
LCA.output: Yes our product is Little Champs Account. It is designed specifically for minors (individuals below the age of 18 years). A child requires the help of a parental/legal guardian to open this account and avail its facilities. Little Champs get a Debit Card and chequebook which is free the first time

LCA.instruction: What are the main Features  of the Little Champs Account.
LCA.output:
Minimum initial deposit of Rs.100/- | Little Champs Savings A/C
Free first chequebook* | Profit Payment | Profit Rate
Free debit card* (annual/replacement fees apply). This debit card has the following limits | Semi-Annually | 0.19
Daily funds Transfer Limit: Rs.100,000/-
Daily ATM Withdrawal Limit: Rs.25,000/-
Daily POS Limit: Rs.50,000/-
* For Current Account only

LCA.instruction: What other Value added features does the Little Champs Account have?
LCA.output:
Attractive returns on savings account
SMS alert service on digital transactions
I Net banking services
Free education insurance plan – Rs.5,000/- per month for 5 years on savings account & Rs.10,000 per month for 5 years on current account in case of death of the guardian

LCA.instruction: What is the account type of Little Champs Account is it saving or current ?
LCA.output: This account is offered both in current and savings categories

LCA.instruction: How can the minor operate this account?
LCA.output:
This account is opened in the name of the minor. However, a minor needs a guardian’s help to avail the account’s facilities
A minor can use the account any time – which means he or she can make deposits or take money out at any time with the guardian’s help.

LCA.instruction: What documents are required to open a Little Champs Account.
LCA.output:
- A photocopy of Form-B, Birth Certificate or Student ID card (as appropriate) of the minor
- A photocopy of any one of the following valid identity documents of the guardian of the minor:
1. Computerized National Identity Card (CNIC) issued by NADRA
2. National Identity Card for Overseas Pakistani (NICOP) issued by NADRA
3. Pakistan Origin Card (POC) issued by NADRA
4. Alien Registration Card (ARC) issued by National Aliens Registration Authority (NARA), Ministry of Interior (local currency account only)
5. Passport, with a valid visa or any other proof of legal stay along with passport (foreign national individuals only)
6. Source of income of guardian

NMA.instruction: Is there any Premature Encashment Penalty in NUST Maximiser Term Deposit?

Principal amount x 1.5% per annum on the remaining period of the Term Deposits

NUST4Car.instruction: What are the benefits of NUST Bank Auto Finance?
NUST4Car.output:
- Competitive Floating & Fixed Mark Up Rate | - Partial Payment option available to reduce monthly instalment
- Attractive Insurance Rate at 1.75% per annum | - Quick Processing & Minimum Documentation
- Free Tracker & Its installation | - No hidden charges
- Free Accidental Life Insurance up to Rs.1,000,000

NUST4Car.instruction: Who can apply for NUST Auto Finance?
NUST4Car.output:
- Salaried Individuals | - Specially Abled Persons/Visually Impaired Person/Persons with Disabilities (PWD)
- Self Employed Businessman/Woman (SEB) | - Individuals having any other verifiable source of income
- Self Employed Professionals (SEP)

NUST4Car.instruction: Which types of Vehicles are offered under NUST auto finance?
NUST4Car.output:
Locally assembled/manufactured
New/Used vehicles
(Commercial vehicles or vehicles for commercial use cannot be financed)

NUST4Car.instruction: Can I avail Loan Facility, if there are defaults against my previous loan(s)?
NUST4Car.output: No. Regular payment against previous loans is necessary.

NUST4Car.instruction: How much loan can I avail?
NUST4Car.output: Up to a maximum of Rs.3 Million from all banks/DFIs in aggregate, subject to a maximum of 40% Debt Burden requirement.

NUST4Car.instruction: What is maximum period of loan?
NUST4Car.output:
Up to 1000 CC Vehicles up to 5 Years
For Vehicles Greater than 1000 CC up to 3 Years

NUST4Car.instruction: How much Equity/Down Payment is required?
NUST4Car.output: Minimum 30% equity +(1st Year Insurance + documentation charges) is required as down payment

NUST4Car.instruction: Can I avail more than one vehicle through Auto loan facility?
NUST4Car.output:
Yes. Two vehicles can be availed simultaneously from NUST Bank, subject to Debt Burden Limitations
9. Can I avail Auto loan facility, if I am not a Salaried Person/Businessman/
Yes. The individual with foreign remittance, supported by Bank statement and remittance receipts can avail Auto Loan Facility
There are no hidden charges. All charges are mentioned in our Schedule of Charges available at our website and at all branches of NUST Bank.

NUST4Car.instruction: Is insurance of vehicle is mandatory?
NUST4Car.output:
Yes. Comprehensive Insurance of vehicle is mandatory for the whole tenor of loan at the cost of the borrower
through any of the insurance companies listed with NUST Bank.

NUST4Car.instruction: What will be the monthly insurance charges on the vehicle valuing Rs.3 million?
NUST4Car.output:
With the current insurance rate of 1.75% per annum, it will be Rs.4,375/- per month.
Insurance rate once fixed, shall remain unchanged during the whole tenor of financing.

NUST Bank has insurance arrangements with reputed insurance companies with attractive insurance rate,
Free Tracker and Free Accidental Life insurance up to Rs.1 million.
Customer has to select insurance company of his/her choice from NUST Panel of insurance companies.

NUST4Car.instruction: Can I pay my loan before maturity?
NUST4Car.output:
Yes. You can pay your loan before maturity. However, charges shall be applicable as per prevailing SOC
https://NUSTbank.com/NUSTUploads/uploads/SOC-Conv-English.pdf

NUST4Car.instruction: What is the security against the loan?
NUST4Car.output: Financed vehicle will be the security against the loan, which will be hypothecated in favour of NUST Bank.

NUST4Car.instruction: Whether bank is responsible for delay in booking or delivery of vehicle?
NUST4Car.output: No. Bank does not assume any responsibility in this regard, as same is beyond the control of bank.

NUST4Car.instruction: Whether bank is responsible for any type of dispute related to Warranty/Fault in vehicle/Service issues with Dealership or vehicle Manufacturer?
NUST4Car.output: No. Bank does not assume this responsibility. Customer will take up the matter directly with dealership or manufacturer.

NUST4Car.instruction: What is the Loan Application processing time?
NUST4Car.output: The processing time for loan approval is approximately 11 working days, subject to complete application with required documents/formalities.

NUST4Car.instruction: How can I apply for loan?
NUST4Car.output:
You can apply by visiting any of our Branch or by calling us at 24 hours Contact Centre at 111-000-787.

Above Rs 1.5 M and up to Rs 7.5M

20% (New Business) | Existing Business
Nil

PMYB &ALS.output: Repayment of PMYB&ALS loans will be made in the form of “monthly or quarterly Instalments (or as per SBP’s directives)

PMYB &ALS.instruction: What is the security requirement for availing PMYB & ALS?
PMYB &ALS.output:
Tier 2
i. Clean; personal guarantee of the borrower
ii. 02 Post Dated cheques for installment amount
iii. 01 Post Dated cheque for full loan amount plus mark up as per amortization schedule | Tier 3
i. Mortgage of residential / commercial / industrial property owned by borrower or third party
ii. HPA on vehicle in the name of borrower or immediate family member i.e. parents, spouse, children, brothers or sisters.

Nust Life.instruction: Can I purchase Bancassurnce policy from my account maintained with NUST Bank?

- EFU Life Assurence Company Ltd
- Jubilee Life Insurance Company Ltd.

Nust Life.instruction: What are the main features of NUST Life Bancassurnace Policy?
Nust Life.output:
- Short term Family Protection and in Long term Savings
- Minimum Policy Amount = 18,000 No Maximum Limit of policy for Munafa Fahfooz Plan Min Premium = 50,000
- NUST Life Munafa Mehfooz Plan Minumum & Maximum Term = 5 Years
- NUST Life Value Plan Minimum Policy Term = 10 Years
- Additional benefits also available on cost (Riders and additional term insurance)
- NUST Life offer diffent plans to customer as per needs and demands of customers

Nust Life.instruction: How many NUST Life  Insurance Plans available?
Nust Life.output:
Plan Type | Premium
o NUST Life Value Plan | Life time Protection and Saving Plan | 18K
o NUST Life Munafa Mehfooz Plan | Limited Time Plan (5 Years) | 50K

Nust Life.instruction: What are the main features of these NUST Life Insurance Plans
Nust Life.output:
- 14 Days Free Look Period start from the day customer received Policy Documents.
- Direct Investment system growth Plans (NUST Life directly invest funds in Universal Life Mutual fund
- NUST bank is only act as a Corporate Sales Agent, It’s a Insurance plan not to be considered as any Bank Account of Term depoist which have annual Fixed Returns.
- In case of early termination, only Cash Value of policy will be payable to customer
- Cancellation of policy and full refund option is available if policy documents returned during Free Lookup Period i.e. 14 days of receipt of documents
- Cash Values of policy may be differ from the tentaive returns provided on illustration document (illustration document is only for information)
Other Important Information about NUST Life Insurance Plans
- Munafa Mehfooz Plan is limited time plan of 5 Years with first year High Allocation and upfront loyalty bonus i.e. 20% on first year
- In case of early termination of Munafa Mehfooz Plan - upfront loyalty bonus amount value will be subtracted from the cash value of policy
- In case of death Cash Value or Sum Assured whichiver is higher will be paid to nominee/s
- Annaul / Half Yearly / Quarterly - Policy Premium Payment Mode Available as per customer conveience
- Policy Growth depends on Accociated Mutual Fund growth
- Death Claims will be handled by NUST Life subject of completion of required documents and eligible if policy status is Active Inforced/Reinstated only
For All NUST Life Banca Products Brochures available

HOME REMITTANCE.instruction: What is Home Remittance ?
HOME REMITTANCE.output: Home Remittance Service enables remitters to send money from abroad to Pakistan instantly, conveniently, and safely through the legal banking channel.

HOME REMITTANCE.instruction: What types of Inward Home Remittance products does NUST Bank offer ?
HOME REMITTANCE.output:
NUST offers the following Home Remittance Products to cater to the needs of various home remittance
beneficiaries in Pakistan:
- Cash Over the Counter (CoC) payments for walk-in customers
- NUST Account Transfer
- Other Bank Account Transfer via Inter Bank Funds Transfer (IBFT) & Real Time Gross Settlement (RTGS)

HOME REMITTANCE.instruction: In which currency will I receive my remittance?
HOME REMITTANCE.output: All home remittance payments are disbursed in Pak Rupees.

HOME REMITTANCE.instruction: Is there any limit on the amount received though NUST Home Remittance?
HOME REMITTANCE.output:
Below are the applicable limits:
- NUST Accounts - No Limit
- Other banks accounts - No Limit
- Cash Over the Counter (CoC) Transactions - Up to PKR 1,000,000/- per transaction and there is no limit of Western Union COC transactions

HOME REMITTANCE.instruction: Are there any charges/fee for NUST's Home Remittance Service?
HOME REMITTANCE.output: NUST Home Remittance Service is free of charge.

HOME REMITTANCE.instruction: Are there any tax deductions on Home Remittances?
HOME REMITTANCE.output: Home Remittance Service is free of taxes.

HOME REMITTANCE.instruction: Can I receive remittance in Pakistan if I do not have a bank account with any bank?
HOME REMITTANCE.output: You can receive your home remittance from any of NUST 600+ domestic branches nationwide if you have a valid CNIC and Transaction Unique Reference No. / Pin code.

HOME REMITTANCE.instruction: Is there any list of branches I can access to get information?
HOME REMITTANCE.output:
The list of NUST domestic branches can be viewed from the Branch Locator available on our corporate website www.nustbank.com .
https://NUSTbank.com/find-us/

HOME REMITTANCE.instruction: Who should I contact in case I need to lodge a complaint regarding Home Remittance?
HOME REMITTANCE.output:
For any query/complaint regarding Home Remittance, you may contact our dedicated Remittance Service Centre at UAN# 021-111-000-787.
You may also email your queries/complaints at remittance@NUSTbank.com.pk

HOME REMITTANCE.instruction: How can I obtain a Proceed Realization Certificate (PRC)/Encashment Certificate against remittance(s) received? Who should I contact?
HOME REMITTANCE.output:
Please find below contact details for obtaining a PRC and e-PRC:
- e-PRC option is also available at the NUST website https://secureportal.NUSTbank.com/eprc/customer to obtain a system generated PRC on your registered email address.
- Proceeds Realization Certificate (PRC) is issued from NUST Centralized Remittance Department. You may contact them at the following email addresses:
remittance.prc@NUSTbank.com.pk

HOME REMITTANCE.instruction: Can I track my remittance status online?
HOME REMITTANCE.output: Yes, you can view the status of your remittance online through NUST Remittance Tracker by following link https://NUSTbank.com/services/alternate-delivery-channels/home-remittance-tracking/

HOME REMITTANCE.instruction: What are NUST's Banking hours to avail home remittance services from NUST Branches?
HOME REMITTANCE.output:
Customers can avail home remittance services from NUST domestic branches during regular business hours appended below:
- Monday to Thursday: 09:00 am to 05:00 pm
- Friday: 09:00 am to 05:30 pm
- Saturday: 09:00 am to 01:30 pm (through selected branches)

HOME REMITTANCE.instruction: Is it important to declare the purpose of the funds being sent to Pakistan?
HOME REMITTANCE.output: Yes, it is mandatory to provide purpose of funds being sent to Pakistan.

HOME REMITTANCE.instruction: I am a foreign national, can I send money to Pakistan?
HOME REMITTANCE.output: Yes, you can.

HOME REMITTANCE.instruction: Does the PRI comes under the laws of State Bank or Government?
HOME REMITTANCE.output: It is a joint initiative of State Bank of Pakistan, Ministry of overseas Pakistanis and Ministry of Finance.

HOME REMITTANCE.instruction: Can the Freelance payment  be made through PRI?
HOME REMITTANCE.output: Yes Freelance payments is allowed under specfic arrangemnts with Tie-ups with allowed purposes as per SBP guidelines.

HOME REMITTANCE.instruction: What conversion rates will be applied on remittance?
HOME REMITTANCE.output: The same conversion rates will be applied at the time of sending the remittance. Affiliated bank or Exchange Company confirm the Conversion rates to Sender at the time of sending the remittance.

HOME REMITTANCE.instruction: Does NUST Bank has specialized remittance Account as per SBP guideline?
HOME REMITTANCE.output: Yes NUST has remittance account name as Pak Wattan Remittance Account.

HOME REMITTANCE.instruction: Who can open Pak Wattan Remittance Account?
HOME REMITTANCE.output: A Bonafide recipient of Home remittance (PRI) can open this account.

HOME REMITTANCE.instruction: Can remittance be sent from anywhere to Pakistan?
HOME REMITTANCE.output:
Yes, remittance can be sent from around the globe to Pakistan through our agent Partners like Western Union, Mastercard, Dandelion Payments (RIA) etc.
For more information please go through the below link:
https://NUSTbank.com/services-home-remittance-our-partners/
